name: predictstack
description: A peer-to-peer prediction market platform on Stacks blockchain using USDCx

scripts.deploy:testnet: clarinet deployment generate --testnet && clarinet deployment apply --testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: clarinet deployment generate --mainnet && clarinet deployment apply --mainnet
scripts.chainhook:start: tsc --project chainhooks/tsconfig.chainhook.json --skipLibCheck && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=chainhooks/.env node --require dotenv/config dist/chainhooks/observer.js
scripts.observer:start: tsc --project chainhooks/tsconfig.chainhook.json --skipLibCheck && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=chainhooks/.env node --require dotenv/config dist/chainhooks/observer-polling.js
